headline: Micron rallies, JetBlue & other airlines face weather disruptions
summary: Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi takes a look at some of Friday morning's trending tickers and stories. Nvidia (NVDA) is acquiring the assets of artificial intelligence (AI) chip startup Groq (GROQ.PVT) for $20 billion, Nvidia's biggest deal yet. Micron (MU) stock is extending its post-earnings rally, on track for a new record. Airline stocks, including Delta (DAL), United (UAL), JetBlue (JBLU), Southwest (LUV), and American (AAL), are in focus as severe winter weather threatens to disrupt holiday travel. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
